name: Harvest Stone
description:
Controls:

Use arrows/WSAD to move, SPACE to talk, Z to open inventory and mouse to use your deadly weapon(stone). 

Description:

Welcome to the world of sorrow and despair, where every day is nightmare, and everything is meaningless! Protect your family! Look for potato! Try to find joy in this dark world … and at the end ask yourself if it was worth living so long and prolonging this agony?

The game is a Harvest Stone. The goal is .. exactly, what Is the goal here? Is it really worth trying when every new day can bring you new tragedy?

The game was created for 52nd LudumDare Jam in 72 hour - see submission page here.

Development team:
  • Kongo (Programming)
  • Diler (Art)
  • JayaSheel (Music)
PS

If you think you found a bug, it could be hallucinations of malnutrition.
